data.title: Somerset Vo-Tech students win gold at skills competition
data.meta_description: On April 16, Somerset County Vocational & Technical High School students competed against other career and technical education students from around the state at the 2016 New Jersey SkillsUSA Championships.
data.text:
Somerset County Vocational & Technical High School students competed against other career and technical education students from around the state at the 2016 New Jersey SkillsUSA Championships. Of the 94 students from SCVTHS who competed, 45 received medals including 19 gold.

The gold-medal winners are now eligible to test their skills in Louisville, Kentucky from June 20-25 at the 52nd annual SkillsUSA National Leadership and Skills Conference (NLSC). During the National Leadership and Skills Conference (NLSC), more than 6,000 career and technical education students will showcase their talents and compete in 100 different trade, technical and leadership fields.

All contests are run with the help of industry, trade associations, and labor organizations. The test competencies are set by industry.

READ: USS Arizona Relic dedication at SCVTHS

The complete list of SCVTHS students who received medals is as follows:

Gold

· Career Pathways Showcase: Education & Training - Novena Petryk-Cordi (Manville), Sandra Raju (Hillsborough), and Gillian Gottlieb (Hillsborough).

· Career Pathways Showcase: Health Science - Brianna Broderick (Flemington), Catherine Chen (Warren), and Anjana Nair (Franklin Park).

· Career Pathways Showcase: Human Services - Ann Marie Masiello (Hillsborough), Madison Hill-Glover (Bridgewater), and Cristina Young (Martinsville).

· Career Pathways Showcase: Natural Resources/Agriculture/Food - Robert Bender (Hillsborough), Alok Pillai (Hillsborough), Satyakrishna Polavarapu (Bridgewater).

· Collision Repair Technology: Giannie Cintron (Bound Brook)

· Criminal Justice: Charles Sharkey (Bridgewater)

· First Aid/CPR: Samantha Shephard (Hillsborough)

· Medical Terminology: Ian Dominick De Los Reyes (Bridgewater)

· Medical Math: Janum Shah (Belle Mead)

· New Jersey Pin Design: Catherine Reisser (Bound Brook)

· Plumbing: Ryan Zaborowski (Bridgewater)

Silver

· Auto Maintenance: Trevor Jones (Belle Mead).

· Career Pathways Showcase: Transportation, Distribution & Logistics - Masood Karimi (Somerset), Farouk Marhaba (Bridgewater), and Martyn Megaloudis (North Plainfield).

· Culinary Arts: Amanda Lamperti (North Plainfield).

· First Aid/CPR: Christopher Santos (Branchburg).

· Heath Occupations Professional Portfolio: Marla Castillo (Bound Brook).

· Health Knowledge Bowl: Julia Garaffa (Skillman), Aaron Lee (Raritan), Michael Pena (Somerset), and Palak Shah (Hillsborough).

· Medical Math: Khushma Parekh (Ringoes).

· Medical Terminology: Christopher Silva (Green Brook).

· Plumbing: Adam Burnett (Basking Ridge).

Bronze

· Career Pathways Showcase: Architecture & Construction - Swati Patel (Somerset) and Harini Prayaga (Bridgewater).

· Screen Printing Technology: Kaycie Sconda (Bridgewater).

· Industrial Motor Control: Joseph Blass (Branchburg).

· Quiz Bowl: Sarah Furman (Flemington), Ruchi Patel (Hillsborough), Evan Sapriman (Hillsborough), Darshan Shah (Hillsborough), Emily Siniscalco (Flemington), Mukta Patwari (Bridgewater), and Christopher Warren (North Plainfield).
